title: Malaika Arora stuns in bold red dress on the red carpet
body: India: One of the hottest divas of Bollywood, Malaika Arora, has a complete fashionista. When it comes to her airport looks, gym looks, or red carpet looks, she always dresses to hear perfection. At the red carpet of Zee Cine Awards 2019, the stunner donned a red bold dress with hair and make-up on fleek. She definitely made heads turn on the red carpet with her bold and stunning attire, reports the pinkvilla.com. After her divorce with husband Arbaaz Khan last year, the diva is dating her rumoured boyfriend Arjun Kapoor. The two are spotted hanging around together in the city and posing to the shutterbugs. Arjun and Malaika, however, have released no official confirmation of their relationship yet but, the media sources have confirmed they are a couple and if rumours are believed, they will soon be tying a knot this year. Malaika was last seen judging the Colors reality show Indiaâ€™s Got Talent with Karan Johar and Kiron Kher. In her real life, the diva is a fitness freak as time and again she posts her fitness videos on her social media handle that leaves her fan in awe of her fit body. She also posts many party pictures of her as she is also a party animal and likes to party hard with her girl gang consisting of Kareena Kapoor Khan, Amrita Arora and Karisma Kapoor.
